body: So I was recently temp banned for a reason that I do not believe was necessary.  So this guy keeps trying to kill me in nebula and he finally kills me.(targeting). Then he says, "f**k you". Docta pop says please be respectful to other players. Then I defend myself by calling him a try hard.Docta pop temp bans me when the other guy was targeting, using profanity and being disrespectful. I admit I shouldn't have defended myself but this should not have resulted in a temp ban.
body_tagged: So I was recently temp banned for a reason that I do not believe was necessary.  So this guy keeps trying to kill me in nebula and he finally kills me.(targeting). Then I defend myself by calling him a try hard.Docta pop temp bans me when the other guy was targeting, using profanity and being disrespectful. I admit I shouldn't have defended myself but this should not have resulted in a temp ban.
title: I dont get it....

replies.body: My first infraction by the way.
replies.body_tagged: My first infraction by the way.

replies.body: It only lasts a day the temp ban but just saying my point of view
replies.body_tagged: It only lasts a day the temp ban but just saying my point of view

replies.body:
I think you have to right to defend yourself, but if it's offensed a staffmember he has to punish you, cuz you were disrespectful.
However to appeal your temp ban send an email at support@avicus.net.
Good luck!
EDIT: Maybe try to contact Pop via skype and apologize...

replies.body: If you believe you were punished unjustly, email support@avicus.net or contact a senior staff member privately. Even if it only lasts a day, if you feel you didn't deserve the tempban, appeal it so that it won't count against you.
replies.body_tagged: If you believe you were punished unjustly, email support@avicus.net or contact a senior staff member privately. Even if it only lasts a day, if you feel you didn't deserve the tempban, appeal it so that it won't count against you.
